rules_text:
Vigilance, deathtouch
At the beginning each of combat, any opponent may collect evidence 8. If they do, tap this creature and put two +1/+1 counter on it. [i](To collect evidence 8, exile cards with total mana value 8 or greater from your graveyard.)[/i]
flavor_text: [i]“I've got my hands tied at the moment.”[/i]
